english_translation: Mujahid said regarding the verse 'And if you are ill' (Al-Maidah 5:6): This means the one with pustules, and the one with wounds, and the one with injuries who fears for himself if he washes or performs ablution that he will die, so these people perform Tayammum. [Also narrated with another chain]: I was serving the Messenger of Allah ﷺ when Gabriel brought the verse of dirt-based purification. The Messenger of Allah ﷺ showed me how to wipe for Tayammum. I struck my hands on the earth, then wiped my face with them, then struck my hands on the earth, then wiped my arms to the elbows.
